channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report I-2024080059
item.description:
Report I-2024080059

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-23T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-13
  • City: Las Vegas
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 08/13/2024, hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL LAS Service Center, 5280 W Badura Ave, Suite 100, Las Vegas, NV 89118 Transportation by road has been confirmed.

item.title: Report X-2024081310
item.description:
Report X-2024081310

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-22T18:16:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-15
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Hazmat package repacked at SALT in an oversized box without markings and not in a drum. Contents leaked through both boxes. Upon inspection, it was discovered that one lid was loose, resulting in leak.

item.title: Report X-2024080146
item.description:
Report X-2024080146

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-22T18:16:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-02
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Discovered during the OB sort. Package is a damaged, undeclared limited quantity hazmat. Outer box has no indication that package is a hazmat, but inner package does. Caps were loose on bottles, and seals were defective. Package was also loaded on its side because there were no exterior orientation arrows to indicate there were liquids inside. The combination of these two facts lead to leakage into and out of container.
